Virginia: s unemployment rate decreased from 5.7 percent to 3.3 percent during McAuliffe's term, while the national unemployment rate dropped from 7 percent to 3.9 percent.
The number of unemployed Virginians decr: from almost 240,000 to about 143,000, during McAuliffe's term.
Only one rural locality: Galax, saw its unemployment rate drop by more than half during McAuliffe's term.
